title: A Real man's job: Images of Australian women in wartime [kit]
creator_credit: History Teacher's Association of Victoria, Australian War Memorial, ImMEDIAte Action and Felicity Cockram
brief_description: Subtitled Images of Australian women in wartime this kit aims to identify the real contribution that women made during both world wars and also at the images of women in wartime that were projected. Authored by Tim Gurry, Robert Lewis and Richard Reid, the kit draws together a wide variety of material with suggestions for its use, into nine Evidence Files, a videocassette and Teacher’s notes.
